title: Only need 1 more! Looking for T80 uzit, T206 Carolina brights on the table to trade!!
author: Blitzu

posts.post_title: Only need 1 more! Looking for T80 uzit, T206 Carolina brights on the table to trade!!
posts.post_content:
As the topic says I need one more T80, an uzit back.  I have Lenox back, a super rare old mill back, and even the uber rare blank back to trade for one of these, or Ill pay cash.

Any help would be appreciated.  Pm or email to [url]bliztu@yahoo.com[/url]

Thanks!!
Jared
Okay, now offering a T206 Carolina bright as trade bait.  $600+ value!!  The t80 needs to be in good condition though.
